name: Funky Unisex Boulder Opal Ring
description:
The stone in this ring is a funky boulder opal from Yowah, which is a small opal mining town in central Queensland, Australia.

I chose this chunky boulder opal to be set with a wide band which can be worn by either males or females. Under direct light the opal has a metallic like luster but on a closer look the multi coloured natural opal colours dance within the stone.

Ring Size: 9
Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Opal Size: 14.10 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 6.28 grams

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Boulder Opal Earrings from Queensland, Australia
description:
This is a pair of solid boulder opals earrings from Queensland, Australia. 

These earrings came from a slab of boulder opal that was handpicked and sliced to reveal these amazing stones.

The silky finish of these stones highlights the dark blue and green colours of the opals. Set in sterling silver these elegant earrings are stunning.

While these opals may be off the same stone there is a slight difference in colour and pattern. 

Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Opal Size: 8.80 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 2.04 grams

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Ancient Roman Glass Pendant
description:
This is a stunning pendant made with ancient glass that is between 700 to 3000 years old. 

The brillant colours come from a chemical reaction from the glass when left in the soil. The sands used to manufacture ancient glass contained manganese and iron ore, impurities which over centuries gives unique colours to the glass when left in the ground. 

A little history lesson....

Thousands of years ago, the Romans came to Afghanistan to trade in glass and teach the art of glass making. Buried for centuries, the discarded chunks had been thrown into a pit for recycling, a common practice in ancient times, but instead were forgotten. 

Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Glass Size: 12.00 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 2.60 grams

*comes with a complimentary simple silver chain.

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Amazing Colours... Opal Silver Ring
description:
This beautiful Australian Opal doublet is made of a slice of natural Australian Opal from Coober Pedy, South Australia, with a backing of ironstone. The simple oval shape is complimented by a stylish mid sized even band in sterling silver.

Even without direct light, the Opal doublet shimmers with green, blue and gold colours.

Ring Size: 7
Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Opal Size: 0.85 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 2.76 grams

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Stunning Boulder Opal Ring
description:
The stone in this ring is a stunning boulder opal from Yowah, which is a small opal mining town in central Queensland, Australia.  

Hand picked from opal rough that we had cut last year was this amazing stone. I left it in it's natural freeform shape and moulded the silver ring around it's curved edges.

Ring Size: 9
Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Opal Size: 11.50 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 6.10 grams

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Olive Green Peridot Silver Ring
description:
Beautiful natural Olive green Peridot set in a stylish sterling silver ring.

This stone is a checkerboard cushion cut Peridot which has been claw set.  

My partner bought this stone back from Tuscon, Arizona earlier this year, which is one of the worlds largest producers of Peridot in the world.  lucky me :-)

Peridot is one of the few gemstones that occur in only one color: basically an olive green. 

The intensity and tint of the green however depends on how much iron is contained in the crystal structure, so the color of individual Peridot gem can vary from yellow-green through olive green to brownish green.

Ring Size: 7
Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Gem Size: 4.00 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 3.58 grams

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Golden Rutilated Quartz Pendant
description:
This is a beautiful natural stone mined in Brazil.  I just love the complexity of this stone and I simply wrapped it in sterling silver to create this pendant.

Rutile is a major ore of Titanium, which is a metal used in high tech alloys.  It often forms needle like crystal inclusions inside quartz.  This form of quartz is know as rutilated quartz and looks like small fingers of imbedded golden needles.

Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Stone Size: 22.50 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 3.88 grams

*comes with a complimentary simple silver chain.

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Lapis Lazuli and Opal Doublet Pendant
description:
Funky little pendant created with two stunning stones.  The four small circles are made of Australian Opal doublets and are silky blue in colour.  They frame the deep blue of the Lapis Lazuli perfectly.

Lapis lazuli has been mined in the Badakhshan province of  Afghanistan for 6,500 years. The finest color is intense blue, lightly dusted with small flecks of golden pyrite.

Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Stone Size: 8.80 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 2.56 grams

*comes with a complimentary simple silver chain.

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Seraphinite and Opal Doublet Pendant
description:
Funky little pendant with a Seraphinite center stone surrounded by vivid blue opal doublets.

This Seraphinite stone has a slate green color and a scaly appearance. Seraphinite apparently acquired its name due to its resemblance to feathers, such as on a bird's wing.

Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Stone Size: 4.45 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 1.79 grams

*comes with a complimentary simple silver chain.

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Pearl Shell With Opal Pendant
description:
This funky pendant is a beautiful blend of blues, silvers and shimmering light greens.  The two Opal doublets bring out the blue in the stunning Mother of pearl piece.   

Mother of pearl is the common name for iridescent nacre, a blend of minerals that are secreted by oysters and other mollusks and deposited inside their shells, coating and protecting them from parasites and foreign objects. Nacre is the same substance that is deposited around an object that becomes lodged in the mollusk--either naturally or inserted by humans--to become a pearl.

Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Stone Size: 10.65 cts
Amount of Silver Used: 3.54 grams

*comes with a complimentary simple silver chain.

Shipping? For you, standard shipping worldwide is free.

name: Exquisite Natural Opal Pendant with Topaz Accents
description:
I can't tell you how amazing this pendant is in real life.  

The center Opal comes from our mine in Lightning Ridge, New South Wales, Australia. Nearly 3.5cm across this pendant would 'make' any outfit.  

The center Opal is flanked with 3 beautiful sea blue Topaz gemstones.

Sterling Silver Stamped 925
Stone Size: 88.00 cts
